mapper.insert:
insert into act_task
student_send_id, student_realize_id, status, task_describe, fee, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag, cancel_time, pay_time, take_time, finish_time, check_time,
#{studentSendId}, #{studentRealizeId}, #{status}, #{taskDescribe}, #{fee}, #{addressId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark}, #{taskTitle}, #{userCheckId}, #{checkContent}, #{delFlag}, #{cancelTime}, #{payTime}, #{takeTime}, #{finishTime}, #{checkTime},
mapper.select: select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, check_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time,take_time from act_task where task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, check_time, take_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where student_send_id = #{studentSendId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, check_time, take_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where student_realize_id = #{studentRealizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, check_time, take_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where student_send_id = #{studentSendId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} and status =#{status,jdbcType=CHAR}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, check_time, take_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where student_realize_id = #{studentRealizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} and status =#{status,jdbcType=CHAR}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee,pay_time, check_time, take_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task where status =#{status,jdbcType=CHAR} and student_send_id <>#{studentSendId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select task_id, student_send_id, student_realize_id, `status`, task_describe, fee, pay_time, check_time, take_time, finish_time, address_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, task_title, user_check_id, check_content, del_flag,cancel_time from act_task
